description: Found by Scotland Yard scratched into the cargo area of a hovercraft bound from Dover to Calais: "Help me. My name is Malon Reeves. I've been kidnapped by a group of terrorist mutants calling themselves the Brotherhood. Don't know how many of them there are, but I know that they've killed a few of my father's guards. Don't know how much time has passed, but it seems like forever since I've eaten. If this note is found, alert the authorities. My father is a very wealthy man and he'll see to your reward should I be found. Please, hurry. I don't think they intend for me to live."
name: Sublime Seduction

description: Will the Super-Ninja finally get his hands on the Supercruiser?
name: The Super-Cruiser

description: Chuck Norris and the Karate Kommandos' new assignment is keeping a new supercomputer safe. Obviously, everything's not as easy as it looks.
name: Margie

description: It's time to learn how Tabe, the Sumo wrestler with a golden heart, met Chuck Norris and joined the Karate Kommandos.
name: Tabe's Story

description: Finally we learn about the people behind the Karate Kommandos and the real threat of the Cult of the Klaw. Chuck's team has to rescue the daughter of an untrustworthy scientist kidnapped by some goons.
name: Kidnapped!

description:
1. Davy Crockett (Foreword)

2. Davy Crockett Indian Fighter

3. The Creek Warrior

4. The Creek Indian Territory (factual)
name: Walt Disney's Davy Crockett, Indian Fighter

description:
1. Call to Arms (foreword)

2. Davey Crockett at the Alamo
name: Walt Disney's Davy Crockett at the Alamo

description: Trapped in a horrific desert conflict, has Namorita finally gone too far?!
name: World War Two ...or Land Must Burn

description:
The New Warriors must deliver the news of the slain Hellions to Magma and Empath. An emotional eulogy follows.

Warpath, Cannonball, and Firestar go to Nova Roma to tell Magma and Empath about the deaths of the Hellions. Soon, everyone, including Magma, find out the lifestyles of the citizens of Nova Roma (and it's history) have all been a lie; and this act was done by Selene, and when she was gone, Empath took the role of tricking people into living fake lives.

Note: Firestar gets a new costume.

Synopsis

After fighting through rough jungle terrain in Brazil, Cannonball, Warpath, and Firestar finally reach their destination: Nova Roma. Having arrived, Cannonball expresses worry that Magma was unable to return any radio messages. Before they can enter the city, Roman soldiers attack the trio. Firestar saves Cannonball from a spear just inches from his face. Warpath dives into the fight and Cannonball begins bowling soldiers over. Before long, the fight is over and Empath and Magma officialy welcome the three to Nova Roma.

Back home, Nova is out on a date with Laura Dunham. Their banter is casual and she teaches him how to properly read Chinese fortunes - simply add "in love" at the end of every one. As their meal ends, Laura asks if he'd like to split the tab. He refuses her offer and then realizes that he won't have enough to cover the meal. As she pulls out her wallet, Nova realizes that he needs to start making money.

In Brazil, a feast begins for the Nova Roma visitors. Cannonball asks about the communications in the area and Magma acts as if she had no clue that anything was wrong. Empath, however, states that it was his fault, as he should have been able to fix such a thing since he is the only technically skilled person there. Firestar then relates why the three have arrived. Cannonball had called her to tell her about the death of the Hellions by Trevor Fitzroy. They decide to visit Empath and Magma, the only other Hellions left alive, to tell them in person. Empath notes their troubles and appreciates telling him so that he and Magma can mourn their friends. Magma tries to speak, but Empath cuts her off and gives off a creepy vibe, as if he is talking for her. He then asks if the trio will be leaving in the morning. Cannonball reluctantly affirms it.

That night, Firestar begins snooping around Nova Roma to find out why she's getting such an odd vibe from the place. It's not long before she runs in to Empath, Magma, Cannonball, and Warpath. Empath has control over the minds of his associates and plans on taking Firestar down with their help.

Off in Connecticut, Speedball learns that his parents are getting a divorce. Speedball leaves the house and meets up with Rage. They rave about some cookies and Rage admits that he's heard nothing on Silhouette. He does mention, however, that he's learned that their base is bigger than they'd thought. He shows Speedball some schematics; the base goes another five stories underground.

In Nova Roma, Firestar does her best to ward off her four attackers. She maneuvers around Cannonball and tricks him into barreling in to Warpath. She moves closer to Empath and he starts to get skittish. Empath explains that since Firestar has gained more control over her powers that he can't control her like he has the others and her microwaves are starting to short out the hold he has on everyone. Before long, the hold is broken and the citizens of Nova Roma, as well as Cannonball, Warpath, and Magma, awaken from an Empath-induced slumber. When pressed, he admits that Nova Roma is a farce. Selene, the immortal mutant, founded it and cast a spell on the inhabitants so that they wouldn't remember where they came from. Seeing the spell weaken and the people beginning to realize they didn't belong, Empath chose to keep the ruse going by taking control of their will. Empath then tells Magma that she, too, is not who she's thought. Instead of being Amara Aquilla she is really a British girl named Allison Crestmere. Seeing the hurt on everyone's faces, Empath agrees to help them all regain their old lives.

Back at the X-Mansion, Cannonball, Warpath, and Firestar meet to pay their last respects. Warpath hands over the official file for the Hellions. They walk away from the file as Firestar's microwave powers burn the folder.

Later, at Namorita's, Firestar looks for a new beginning and finally lets Namorita design a new costume for her. After rifling through tons of clothes, a costume is made.
name: Ruins

description: Guest-starring Spider-Man, Archangel, Cloak & Dagger, and Doctor Strange. A new era begins for the Warriors, but will it be their last?
name: Forces Of Darkness, Forces Of Light, Act 1 - Crawling To The Shadows

story_arc_credits.name: Forces Of Darkness, Forces Of Light

first_appearance_storyarcs.name: Forces Of Darkness, Forces Of Light

description: Guest-starring Spider-Man, Cloak & Dagger, Fantastic Four, Avengers and Doctor Strange. It's guest-stars galore as the Warriors face their darkest hour!
name: Forces of Darkness, Forces of Light, Act 2 - The Soul Canyons

story_arc_credits.name: Forces Of Darkness, Forces Of Light

first_appearance_storyarcs.name: Forces Of Darkness, Forces Of Light

description: Guest-starring Spider-Man, Archangel, Cloak & Dagger, Fantastic Four, Avengers and Doctor Strange. It's hero vs. hero and the Void will take them all! Story concludes in New Warriors Annual #3
name: Forces of Darkness, Forces of Light - act three: Braking the back of love

story_arc_credits.name: Forces Of Darkness, Forces Of Light

first_appearance_storyarcs.name: Forces Of Darkness, Forces Of Light

description: Cardinal returns and he's not alone! Are the New Warriors ready to handle the high-flying attack of Air Force?
name: Hawks and Doves

description: Vance Astrovik plays peace-maker when he tries to stop a riot in his prison. The problem is, with so many super-powered convicts, there are special needs. The prisoners don't want to escape; they want their circumstances acknowledged. Vance succeeds at making everyone happy. For example; he talks the warden into letting a plant-based villain have a small plant in his cell. That's more then enough for that paticular convict.
name: The scales of Justice

description: A can't miss tale for any New Warriors fan.
name: Family Values

description:
Who lives? Who dies? Is anybody safe? Just ask Granny Staples!

In this issue: Rage gets really mad!
name: Family honor, poisoned memories

description: Is Rage a murderer? Will Thrash turn him in? Can any of the Warriors face their families again? If you thought the last few issue were intense, just wait!
name: Family viewing

description: After a confrontation with the new vigilante group Psionex, things have seemingly gotten back to normal. Everyone's happy...and something is wrong with time. It's the same day that it was yesterday? Something is wrong.
name: Basic Arithmetic

description: It's the startling return of Cardinal and Air Force and the introducing Soldiers of Misfortune!
name: Might makes wrong

description: Who or what is Protocol and what devilish plans does he have for the New Warriors?
name: Unacceptable losses

description: It's the final showdown with the Soldiers of MIsfortune! And one of the New Warriors isn't coming home!
name: Payback's a real switch

description: Guest-starring Sub-Mariner. Kymaera is gone! The New Warriors have to notify her next of kin and you can bet that the Savage Sub-Mariner will not be taking the news lightly.
name: Breaking points!

description:
Guest-starring Sabra. When nations go to war, is their anything our young heroes can do?

A vital peace conference threatens to turn into bloodshed when someone is brainwashing the guards.
name: Shalom, shalom

description: Guest-starring Sabra. Sabra's mind and power have been usurped! Can the Warriors survive long enough to save her. Plus, a cliffhanger ending that continues over into Nova (1994 2nd Series) #18.
name: Radicals

description: The second STEAMPUNK story arc begins in part 1 of the 3-part "Mechanica Sundown"! Cole Blaquesmith sets out with his ragged gang of steampunks, seeking to fill in the gaps of his memory so that he can find the weapon that will surely mean Absinthe's destruction.
name: Monsters

description: In Part 2 of "Mechanica Sundown," Cole learns the origins of the manimatronics that keep him alive, and gains another piece of the puzzle which is his memory. Laslo, Vicki and Cole undergo their own personal moments of crisis. Meanwhile, Faust goes on a tear through the countryside, and we meet a fringe group of freedom fighters known as the Sundowns.
name: Machines

description: The conclusion to the 3-part "Mechanica Sundown." Cole makes a major discovery regarding his shrouded past, but it may not matter, as Cole and Co. have to defend a savage attack on Sundown Labs. Plus, a visit to Stonehenge...or, at least, the STEAMPUNK equivalent of Stonehenge...
name: Masques

description: Deadpool gets a new place after Taskmaster blew up the Deadlounge (his hideouts have a habit of blowing up). Now all he has to do is pay for it. He takes a job from an undercover cop who wants 6 high end mob bosses dead. Deadpool, after a little bit of reluctance, takes the job rationalizing that it's killing 6 to save thousands... that and he needs rent money.
name: Cruel Summer (part 1 of 3)

description: While Deadpool was tracking down the mob bosses, his employer's wife was shot and killed. Now, Deadpool's informant gets a little closer to him. Close enough to see his face. But when ever things start going good for Deadpool something always messes it up.
name: Cruel Summer (part 2 of 3)

description:
Deadpool wakes up in a coffin. Not the best place in most people's book.
Frank and Anna plan to run away with the insurance money from Frank's wife's life insurance policy.
name: Cruel Summer (part 3 of 3)

description: Deadpool, broke and depressed, goes for a night on the town.
name: Cat Magnet

description:
Deadpool, while on a job, meets a young man named Christopher. Christopher's dad just died and he blames Deadpool. Deadpool, out of a strange sense of honor, takes Christopher under his wing and makes him: KID DEADPOOL!
meanwhile Vanessa tries to get closer to Deadpool.
name: The Promise

description: Deadpool and his new sidekick stake out their target. Meanwhile Vanessa starts to obsess over why Deadpool won't call.
name: The Promise part two of two

description: Deadpool battles with the switch blade sisters.
name: Talk of the Town

description: Deadpool finishes things with the Switch Blade Sisters. Christopher has just received a huge inheritance but there's one stipulation. He has to avenge his aunt's death by killing The Punisher.
name: Talk of the Town part 2 of 2

description: Deadpool is hired by a mob inheritor to kill The Punisher. It doesn't go well.
name: End of the Road

description: Deadpool, now captured by The Punisher, has to free himself and kill Frank Castle in order to obtain a large sum of money. Things fall apart when his employer dies.
name: End of the Road part: 2

description:
Deadpools healing factor is pushed to its extreme limit in his battle with Rhino! Check out Deadpool take on one of Spider-Mans deadliest villains!

After being given a mental virus by Swan which causes him to confuse words and ruin his aim, Deadpool is hired to retrieve the Rhino's horn to make his employer more... vigoress for his young wife. After a mostly one-sided battle, made increasingly more difficult by his worsened aim, Deadpool uses Ant-Man's gas canister and shrinks Rhino. His client's wife, however, doesn't want a more energetic husband, so Deadpool, in an attempt to play marriage counselor, leaves a clean weapon for the two, thinking it would scare them into working out their problems. It does not. The issues ends with Deadpool feeding an oreo to little Rhino, who he is keeeping in a tank.
name: Healing Factor - chapter 1 : I Forget

description:
Deadpool gets dazzled by the X-Mens Dazzler! Will Wade be able to keep his cool in this throw-back, disco-aged issue? Its back to the future, because you demanded it!

The issue begns with Deadpool and his crew celebrating the wealth he earned from his last job, and is then hired to protect a Dazzler, who is bringing back disco, from a man who hates disco. When the man tries to shoot her from inside a disco ball, Deadpool serves as a human shield for Dazzaler while Rhino, who was brought along on a key-chain, meddles with the disco ball's controls. However, Deadpool gets pissed off since Rhino gets all the credit for the save, so, naturally, he abuses Rhino a bit and then flushes him down the toilet.
name: Healing Factor - chapter 2: Buddy Picture

description: This multiple award-winning comic magazine features the hilarious misadventures of a group of gamers (the Knights) and their friends, along with useful role-playing and other articles for gamers, from a gamer's perspective. It's a slice of (fantasy) life in strips, articles, reviews and features, and a wonderful celebration of the gaming culture!
name: Opportunity Knocks!
